info.title: Cancellation API
info.description:
'This service allows you to cancel a sale within the 14 day cooling off period. 

If the sale is outside of the cooling off period the API will return a validation error - see error schema. 

You can not cancel individual products within a sale.

This service is restricted.  Should you wish to use this service please inform a member of our team who will enable the service for your account.'

post.description: cancel a sale by offering id

parameters.name: X-InsuranceHub-VendorId
parameters.description: Your unique vendor identifier - as displayed in your Account page.

parameters.name: X-InsuranceHub-AuthToken
parameters.description:
The authentication token value is generated by concatenating your vendor identifier (for example 59b9f7da07bde3119956002186eb0899) with current ***UTC date*** in the format ddMMyyyy (for example, the 5th October 2018 would be 05102018).

An HMAC digest is then generated from the resulting string using the SHA1 hash function and your API Key as the HMAC key. Finally, this value is then base64 encoded.

Requests with invalid or missing authentication headers will receive a status 401 Unauthorized

400.description: Bad Request - The data in the request is either invalid or incomplete

403.description: Forbidden - You can not read, create or update data for the specified vendor

requestBody.description: request with the sale to cancel

offeringId.description: The unique identifier of the Offering received from the Quote API and submitted to the Sales API
